title: Write an Explainer Article
description: A complex topic is in the news (e.g., a new piece of legislation). A reporter needs to write an 'explainer' article that breaks it down for a general audience.

tasks.description: Research the topic thoroughly to gain a deep understanding.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent becomes a temporary expert on the topic.

tasks.description: Structure the article in a Q&A format or with clear subheadings to make it easy to digest.
Draft the article using simple, clear language and analogies to explain complex concepts.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complex topic is made understandable to a layperson.
